modName: Working Jail Doors & Powered Jail Doors
modShortDescription: The jail doors were working was the last time in Alpha 16 version. So Claymore ported the original recipe over to 7 Days to Die Alpha 18 version.
modDescription:
If you remember, that jail doors once worked. The doors were working was the last time in Alpha 16 version. So Claymore ported the original recipe over to 7 Days to Die Alpha 18 version. Same recipe, same harvest loot, same everything.

One exception: To make them 100% work again, Claymore had to remove the multiblockdim. But doesn’t really matter, since it simply works great. And he currently added powered jail doors too. Simply add 2 electrical components and craft the powered variants. If you have unlocked it like all powered doors need to.

Compatible with Alpha 18 game version.

**Changelogs**

* 1.0.1: Collision: Bullets don’t collide anymore with the jaildoor.
* 1.0.2: Added: Powered Jaildoors. Gated like other powered doors.
* 1.0.3: Added: Secondary recipe for Powered Jaildoors: If you already have normal jaildoors crafted, simply add 2 electrical components to it in the workbench.
* 1.0.4: XPATH correction: Somehow worked, but missed an important thing.
* 1.1.0: Major bugfix: Powered ones could be crafted without unlocking them via perks or recipe.
* 1.2.0: Major bugfix: Unlocking via schematic didn’t work properly.
* 1.2.1: Update for post 18.3 versions: Localizationfix
* 1.3.0: Missed the repair material. Fixed. **_(New)_**

[Download](https://www.mediafire.com/file/vnvwemtknjyyscr/Claymore_Working_Jaildoors.zip)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/15031-claymores-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Claymore](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/claymore/)
